instruction: Put the following sentences in sequence to form a coherent paragraph.
input: He had been walking for hours through the dark woods. He felt a chill run down his spine. Suddenly, he heard a noise in the bushes. He could see a figure moving in the shadows.
output: He had been walking for hours through the dark woods when he suddenly felt a chill run down his spine. He heard a noise in the bushes and, peering into the shadows, he could see a figure moving.
